description: DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services**
==============================================

**Solicitation Number:** S4507792
**Reference Number:** CB-6937-23556243
**Modification Number:** 3
**Publication Date:** 2023-07-05
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-07-13T12:00:00
**Modification Date:** 2023-07-13

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking temporary help services. This solicitation is open only to those suppliers who are qualified under the following streams and categories: Temporary personnel services (UNSPSC 80111600).

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
This tender is open to suppliers in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of National Defense, located in Ottawa, ON, Canada.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at CFSGO GTemporaryHelp GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca. Phone: (613) 971-7955

**Attachments:**
The tender package can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at the following links:

* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6937/s4507792--method-1-right-fit---rfp_1.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6937/s4507792---method-1---rfp-%28french-version-%28004_1.pdf

Note that the original text was quite lengthy, but the rewritten version should have all the necessary information while being concise and easy to read. The language used is also more formal and professional. 

Let me know if you have any further requests!
